attributes.action: Create a annual NHS charity funding day
attributes.background: We have Red Nose Day for comic relief but what about having a day each year were across the country money is raised to support the NHS.  This would spercificaly help to support the NHS from a national fun day. It could help to be a large NHS source of finance and help to improve the service provided

rejection.details: This would be something that charities would organise, not the Government or Parliament.
